evidence.claim: Devi Source utilizes AWS services for their cloud infrastructure.
They comply with HIPAA regulations for handling sensitive health data.
Integration with FHIR APIs is mentioned as part of their health data solutions.
Use of Kafka for data streaming in health tech applications.
Implementation of RESTful APIs for connecting with EHRs.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence found regarding X12 transactions or clearinghouse services.
